                           java.io.File outputJar)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Compiles a Jimple in a project to an output JAR file
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the project in the workspace to compile
        libraries - - a list of library or library directory file paths
        outputJar - The location to output the resulting jar
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException

      • compile

        public static void compile(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                           java.io.File jimpleDirectory,
                           java.io.File outputJar,
                           boolean allowPhantomReferences,
                           java.util.List<java.io.File> libraries,
                           boolean outputBytecode,
                           soot.Transform... transforms)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Compiles the Jimple in the given project to a jar
        Parameters:
        project - The primary project to compile (referenced projects will be considered automatically)
        jimpleDirectory - The project's root Jimple directory
        outputJar - The output file location to write the resulting jar file
        allowPhantomReferences - Allows phantom references to exist
        libraries - A list of file paths to library dependencies or directories containing multiple library dependencies
        outputBytecode - If true the jar consists of class files else the jar consists of jimple files
        transforms - An optional array of program transformations to apply before compilation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
